title: Application Compliance Engineer, Wallet & Payments
summary: Apple is seeking an outstanding Application Compliance Engineer to focus on the design and delivery of audit controls and processes within the Wallet and Payment Engineering Team.
description: You will work with application engineering, infrastructure, and corporate compliance teams to design and implement accurate controls. Serve as an advisor to Engineering, Security, and Business process teams to assist them in supporting compliance efforts.
key_qualifications: Understanding of key infrastructure including micro-services architectures, Git, code repositories, Infrastructure-as-a-code, Kubernetes, CI/CD frameworks. Understanding of the wider FinTech industry, mobile payments, global banking, Card network and associated regulatory requirements...
education_experience: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related discipline, or commensurate experience and 6+ years experience in engineering compliance and security 6+ years experience in payments (Issuer/Acquirer/Card network/Payment Gateway etc). Hands-on technology operations in large enterprise environments CISSP and CISA are not required but a plus
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
